snippet.title: Warhammer 40K: Dawn of War - Campaign Playthrough Part 1 (Planet Fall, No Commentary)
snippet.description:
This is the campaign playthrough for Warhammer 40K: Dawn of War with no commentary.

The original Dawn of War doesn't officially support widescreen, so this version I'm playing is a modified widescreen fix which stretches the game-screen and interface to fit 16:9 aspect ratio. So the game may look out of proportion. The minimap is still not fix though and extends over the interface. I'm also using a zoom mod which gives you a better/ further view of the battlefield.  
 
Mission 1: Planet Fall

Enjoy.
